summary:
My experience working within several operations teams in a very successful, dynamic, multicultural, demanding and challenging environment taught me that operations are truly vital for the success of any business in any sector, big or small. 

As a company grows and the business focus changes, there are always operational issues and risks to go along with the progress that it has made. Issues like complex processes, legacy, outdated systems, manual workload, scaling up, not having the right team with the right skills at the right time, the misalignment of expectations between the relevant stakeholders, the compliance risks and much more of the common operational challenges. These challenges if not dealt with properly, it will not only slow the business down but it will also affect the staff’s ease of working in addition to the partners/customers experience.

The exposure to the several operations challenges during my career helped me to develop the right attitude and the necessary skills in order to manage these challenges successfully whether individually or within teams. I have been exposed to the majority of these issues in which I have found my passion in solving and gradually started seeking these challenges out. I am all about the eye for details, the innovative spirit, the continuous learning, the analytical and data driven mindset, the business awareness, the ruthless prioritisation, the resilient attitude, the servicing nature, the always on problem solving mode, the connection seeking, the leading passion and always doing the right thing attitude.

Please feel free to drop me a message, if you want to know more!

profile_positions.description:
As a Senior Operations Specialist I am responsible for delivering and driving projects and optimising operational processes impacting both partners and internal stakeholders. I am responsible for driving and supporting frictionless and bug free user experience of the Booking.com internal and partner facing systems, tools and products. This role drives alignment of commercial and operational process between the business units in Partnerships and participate in sensitive and strategic projects on an organisation level. 

Tasks:
- Finding and Implementing innovative ways to optimise/improve/automate/clarify operational processes for the combined partnerships department. 
- Bridging the gap between Operations, Commercial, Product & Tech. 
- Developing Tools, procedures and communication frameworks to ensure company wide strategy and compliance.
- Increase automation to ensure accuracy and increase overall efficiencies/data framework globally. 
- Maintain and improve the partner experience throughout the partner journey.
- Underlying focus on decreasing inbound and increasing automations while simultaneously increasing the positive user experience for both internal and external users. 
- Evaluate business needs to find automation focussed solutions.
- Document all new procedures, liaise with relevant stakeholders for implementation support. 
- Make sure the knowledge of new processes and procedures is shared with all users and organise training if needed.
- Manage all stakeholder issues from a high level perspective and drive change according to company priorities. 
- Lead by example by showing a positive can-do attitude and role modeling the principle of taking ownership and the Booking.com values.
profile_positions.title: Senior Operations Specialist - Partnerships

profile_positions.description:
In this role, I am a part of the partnerships contracting team in Booking.com. My team handles new and existing partnerships contracting and setup. Supporting the sales team closing the deals and enabling partners. 

My role as a deal facilitator within the team is more focused on facilitating high complex deals in a dynamic B2C, B2B and B2B2B environment by offering the right solutions and advice from operational perspective. Besides handling high complex cases myself, I also do support the associates within my team and the several stakeholders within the department by answering their inquiries and offering consultancy as a specialist. 

Contracts includes several terms, conditions and promises in several aspects that require commercial, technical, systems, tools, finance and legal knowledge. My main tasks is to create alignment between the several commercial, product, operations and legal teams, and reflect this alignment in the contract with the partner making sure that we can deliver on our promises to our partners in the most compliant and efficient way.

I do also work on several types of projects with several stakeholders from several teams, some projects are directly related to my day to day tasks, some other projects are related to updating our contracts library in order to accommodate the new types of partnerships and products, other projects are more related to process development and efficiency, and finally projects related to team support and sharing knowledge.
profile_positions.title: Operational Specialist - Deal facilitation Partnerships
Operational Associate TMCs - Business Travel Partnerships
Senior Customer Service Executive

profile_positions.description:
As a customer service agent I am a part of the 1st line of customer support for the global OTA industry leading Booking.com. My job was to liaise between the guests and accommodations and a high level of customer service. 

Tasks:
- Handle inbound from Customer and partners via phone and email.
- Handle customers and partners requests
- Handle customer and partners complaints
- Participate in customer service related projects
profile_positions.title: Customer Service Executive

profile_positions.description:
As a Case Officer (Content moderator) at the Abuse Prevention Department my main responsibility was to handle incoming complaints via mail, post, fax and phone. Offering satisfactory solutions in line with the company policy, prevent legal conflicts and maintain the company’s reputation were my main focuses. 

Tasks:
- Handle and investigate incoming content complaints.
- Validate Complaints and discuss with complainers. 
- Contacting customers to find solutions and arrange agreements with respect to the incoming complaints.
- Monitoring settled cases to make sure that customers and complainers are satisfied and if the handling is done in compliance with the company’s policy
- Handling several projects with respect to administration, documentation and reporting (weekly, monthly and yearly) department related issues.
profile_positions.title: Case Officer Abuse Prevention Department

profile_positions.description:
As a Sales Support, my main responsibilities were to verify new orders making sure they are fitting with the client acceptance policy of Leaseweb, inform customers about the services and products catalogue, and act as 1st line customer support via phone, email and live chat.

Tasks
- Validate incoming orders, collect and update missing data.
- Answer customer inquiries via phone, email and live chat.
profile_positions.title: Sales Support
